function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Study may not apply to future effectiveness of NPIs in the region","Impact":"Inaccurate NPI effectiveness assessment for future outbreaks","Mitigation":"Regularly update NPI effectiveness assessments based on current data","Technologies":"Data analytics, predictive modeling","People":"Population of the Gulf state region","Owner":"Health authorities, research organizations"},{"Description":"Changes in the COVID-19 epidemic in Saudi Arabia since the study period","Impact":"Inaccurate representation of current COVID-19 epidemiological data","Mitigation":"Continuously update and validate COVID-19 epidemiological data","Technologies":"Data collection tools, epidemiological modeling","People":"Public health officials, epidemiologists","Owner":"Government health agencies, research institutions"}]}
